frontmatter.title: Scrolling List With ScrollViewReader
frontmatter.intro: This post explains how to programmatically scroll SwiftUI's List to a certain row.

frontmatter.title: DispatchQueue: Synchronous vs Asynchronous / Serial vs Concurrent
frontmatter.intro: This post defines `Asnychronous vs Synchronous` and `Concurrent vs Serial`, and walks through four different combinations of the two concepts.
